name: TUTORIAL_SKILL_1
description: Complete a non-guided tutorial play-through.

name: MISSION_1_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 1 after opening the Main Gates before round 7.

name: MISSION_1_SKILL_2
description: Complete Mission 1 after lighting yourself on fire by blowing up an oil barrel.

name: MISSION_1_SKILL_3
displayName: We have an army, you know...
description: Complete Mission 1 after killing at least 10 Iron Fang Pikemen.

name: MISSION_2_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 2 after killing all three Winter Guard on your first turn.

name: MISSION_2_SKILL_2
description: Complete Mission 2 without a single Trencher dying.

name: MISSION_3_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 3 after killing 3+ Assault Kommandos with Rourke.

name: MISSION_3_SKILL_2
displayName: One Hand Tied Behind My Back
description: Complete Mission 3 without attacking with the Lancer.

name: MISSION_4_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 4 after dealing at least 1 damage to the Butcher with Allison's melee attack.

name: MISSION_5_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 5 after killing at least 5 enemies in one turn with ranged attacks.

name: MISSION_5_SKILL_2
displayName: It’s Not the Fall, It’s the Stop At The End
description: Complete Mission 5 after killing 4+ Man-O-War Shocktroopers with the exploding bridge.

name: MISSION_6_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 6 after damaging 3+ enemies with a Stormcall Triangulation attack in one turn.

name: MISSION_6_SKILL_2
description: Complete Mission 6 after rescuing all 3 Stormcallers before round 5.

name: MISSION_7_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 7 after dealing damage to 6+ enemy units with Rockbiter Charges.

name: MISSION_7_SKILL_2
description: Complete Mission 7 after getting the Troll to kill 3+ enemy units.

name: MISSION_8_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 8 after killing the Man-O-War Kovnik with Allison Jakes.

name: MISSION_8_SKILL_2
description: Complete Mission 8 after destroying both small Train Turrets by round 5.

name: MISSION_8_SKILL_3
description: Complete Mission 8 after killing 2+ enemy units with a single Slam or Throw.

name: MISSION_9_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 9 after the Trolls have killed 4+ enemy units.

name: MISSION_9_SKILL_2
description: Complete Mission 9 without any of the Trollbloods dying.

name: MISSION_10_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 10 without losing any Gunmages.

name: MISSION_10_SKILL_2
description: Complete Mission 10 without any enemy units entering the fort.

name: MISSION_10_SKILL_3
description: Complete Mission 10 after knocking down 10+ enemy units.

name: MISSION_11_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 11 after killing at least 2 enemies with an exploding Bile Thrall.

name: MISSION_11_SKILL_2
description: Complete Mission 11 after killing 3+ enemies with a single Trample Power Attack.

name: MISSION_12_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 12 after killing all 11 enemies from the attack waves BEFORE destroying the Necrotite Rigs.

name: MISSION_12_SKILL_2
description: Complete Mission 12 after destroying the Iron Lich Overseer BEFORE destroying the Necrotite Rigs.

name: MISSION_12_SKILL_3
description: Complete Mission 12 after all Necrotite Container piles have been destroyed.

name: MISSION_13_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 13 after killing one enemy with a magic attack, one with a ranged attack, and one with a melee attack in a single turn.

name: MISSION_13_SKILL_2
description: Complete mission 13 without Allison Jakes taking any damage.

name: MISSION_13_SKILL_3
displayName: The Enemy of My Enemy is My Friend
description: Complete Mission 13 without losing more than 4 Khadoran units.

name: MISSION_14_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 14 without Jakes being attacked by Sturgis while hiding.

name: MISSION_14_SKILL_2
description: Complete Mission 14 after killing 10+ Mechanithralls with Allison Jakes.

name: MISSION_15_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 15 after rescuing every imprisoned Trencher.

name: MISSION_15_SKILL_2
description: Complete Mission 15 after slaying 25+ Mechanithralls.

name: MISSION_15_SKILL_3
description: Complete Mission 15 after killing two Bonejacks with one Heavy Warjack in a single turn.

name: MISSION_16_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 16 after killing two enemies with a single Trencher Assault.

name: MISSION_16_SKILL_2
description: Complete Mission 16 after executing a combined attack with at least 5 participants.

name: MISSION_17_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 17 after eliminating the first destroyer before round 5.

name: MISSION_17_SKILL_2
description: Complete Mission 17 after dealing at least 1 damage to the Strakhov before round 12.

name: MISSION_18_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 18 after damaging at least 5 units with exploding Orgoth Soul Shrines.

name: MISSION_18_SKILL_2
description: Complete Mission 18 after defeating the Butcher without him damaging any friendly unit. Good luck!

name: MISSION_19_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 19 after killing 5+ enemy units with melee attacks from Allison Jakes.

name: MISSION_19_SKILL_2
description: Complete Mission 19 after killing 5+ enemy units with ranged attacks from Allison Jakes.

name: MISSION_19_SKILL_3
description: Complete Mission 19 after killing 5+ enemy units with magic attacks from Allison Jakes.

name: MISSION_19_SKILL_4
description: Complete Mission 19 after defeating Sturgis on the second round.

name: MISSION_20_SKILL_1
description: Complete Mission 20 without a single friendly unit being killed by the Molicron.

name: MISSION_20_SKILL_2
description: Complete Mission 20 after Allison Jakes scores 8 melee hits in one turn.

name: DS_MISSION_1_TIME
displayName: We Don't Have Time for This
description: Complete Mission 1 of Dark Seduction without defeating the Vanquisher warjack.

name: DS_MISSION_2_OOPS
description: Defeat three of the three-man Cinerator patrols near the end of Mission 2 of Dark Seduction.

name: DS_MISSION_3_AWKWARD
description: Knock down Haley and Deneghra at the same time in Mission 3 of Dark Seduction.

name: DS_MISSION_4_LABORJACKS
description: Kill 10 enemies with Nomad warjacks in Mission 4 of Dark Seduction.

name: DS_MISSION_5_WALTZ
description: Complete Mission 5  of Dark Seduction without killing any Cygnar units.

name: DS_MISSION_6_SNAKE
displayName: Cut the Head Off the Snake
description: Kill the Iron Lich Overseer in Mission 6 of Dark Seduction, and its battlegroup, without losing any Cygnar units.

name: DS_MISSION_7_OVERTIME
description: Complete Mission 7 of Dark Seduction using only one Necrosurgeon.

name: DS_MISSION_8_COORDINATED
description: Complete Mission 8 of Dark Seduction before the Necrosurgeons spawn ten Mechanithralls.

name: DS_MISSION_9_TABLED
description: Complete Mission 9 of Dark Seduction with Haley the only remaining Cygnar unit on the map.

name: DS_MISSION_9_FOCUS
description: Complete Mission 9 of Dark Seduction without any units dying.

name: DS_MISSION_10_MYSTORY
description: Complete Mission 10 of Dark Seduction without adding any units or warjacks to Haley's squad.

name: DS_MISSION_10_ODDS
description: Add the Cygnar heavy warjacks in Mission 10 of Dark Seduction to Haley's squad.
